pageContext.claim: “Peoples lives are being shattered and destroyed by a mere allegation. Some are true and some are false. Some are old and some are new. There is no recovery for someone falsely accused - life and career are gone. Is there no such thing any longer as Due Process?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump himself has a habit of leveling accusations without evidence. And he has been accused by more than 16 women of sexual harassment or inappropriate behavior.
